groceries.name: Carl's Meat Market
groceries.description: Fine meats and poultry products. Daily lunch specials, and one of the largest craft beer selections in southern Maine.

groceries.name: Golden Harvest Produce
groceries.description: Fresh, local produce. Wine, cheese, pie. Everything for a delecious meal can be found here.

groceries.name: Terra Cotta Pasta
groceries.description: Gourmet line of all natural fresh pastas, ravioli and sauces. Their motto: 'You boil the water, let Terra Cotta Pasta do the rest.'

groceries.name: Beach Pea Bakery
groceries.description: Artisan breads, pastries, and sweets. Handcrafted salads, sandwiches, and soup.

fuel.name: Portsmouth Yacht Club
fuel.description: The fuel dock is open 7 days a week in season and is available to all boaters.

supplies.name: Hamilton Marine Supply
supplies.description: Located on the Rt. 1 bypass about 1 mile away is Hamilton Marine Supply that has all your boating needs.

repairs.name: Island Marine Servicei
repairs.description: Servicing Kittery & Portsmouth harbor since 1992. Complete line of seasonal maintenance and repairs.
